sentence.Network_en: Some of his first interviews with the press were rather maladroit.
sentence.Network_cn: 他最早接受媒体采访时有几次显得很生涩。

sentence.Network_en: A maladroit movement of his hand caused the car to swerve.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的手笨拙的移动使得车突然转向.

sentence.Network_en: The chairman was criticized for his maladroit handing of the press conference.
sentence.Network_cn: 主席由于处理记者招待会的拙劣而被批评.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... malevolent 恶意的 maladroit 笨拙的 micro- 表示“微，小”.
刘毅词汇22000(带音标版) ... chic 漂亮的，时髦的 maladroit 笨拙的；愚钝的 naive 天真的，质朴的.
词源: malus(L.), male(L.), bad 坏的, 邪恶的maladroit a. 不熟练的, 笨拙male mascul
Barron’s 800 words - 小马过河 ... lucid 明晰的 maladroit 不灵巧的 malevolent 有恶意的, 坏心肠的.

a maladroit comment ., 不得体的评论.
a maladroit movement of his hand caused the car swerve ; a maladroit translation ; maladroit propaganda .他的手的笨拙的动作导致汽车突然转向；笨拙的翻译；拙劣的宣传。
Sur sa patte maladroiteJ'écris ton nom Sur le tremplin de ma porteSur ...在它的笨拙的脚上我写了你的名字在我的门的跳板上在熟稔的东西上在祝福的.

entry.tran: 不灵巧的;笨拙的;迟钝的;不老练的
entry.def: If you describe someone as maladroit, you mean that they are clumsy or handle situations badly.

example.ex: Some of his first interviews with the press were rather maladroit.
example.tran: 他最早接受媒体采访时有几次显得很生涩。

sentences.sentence: "a maladroit movement of his hand caused the car to swerve"

auth_sentence.content: His maladroit fumbling had been honed to a streamlined accuracy.
auth_sentence.res_content: His maladroit fumbling had been honed to a streamlined accuracy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His maladroit fumbling had been honed to a streamlined accuracy.

auth_sentence.content: The self-consciousness which made her so socially maladroit.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The self-consciousness which made her so socially maladroit.

auth_sentence.content: But while his maladroit public performances have not helped, at the root of the President's trouble lies policy, not personality.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But while his maladroit public performances have not helped, at the root of the President's trouble lies policy, not personality.

stems_affixes.word_buile: mal坏,恶+content满意的→adj.不满的 n.不满者
